sentences.en: an exit for use in emergencies
sentences.cn: 紧急出口

sentences.en: Can I use your phone?
sentences.cn: 我可以用一下你的电话吗？

sentences.en: he had no use for a single glove.
sentences.cn: 单个手套对他没用。

sentences.en: He has said he will use all the weapons at his disposal.
sentences.cn: 他放出话说他将使出十八般武艺。

sentences.en: He wanted to use computers to automate the process.
sentences.cn: 他想通过计算机实现流程的自动化。

sentences.en: I always use the same shampoo.
sentences.cn: 我一直用同一种洗发水。

sentences.en: I could use some money, Sarah told him flatly.
sentences.cn: 萨拉态度坚决地告诉他，我可以用一部分钱。

sentences.en: I use the short-wave radio to get the latest war news.
sentences.cn: 我用短波收音机收听最新的战事新闻。

sentences.en: I’ll show you which room you can use.
sentences.cn: 我来跟你说一下你可以用哪个房间。

sentences.en: It isn't them who use up the world's resources.
sentences.cn: 并不是他们把全球的资源耗费殆尽的。

sentences.en: Recent, more dramatic use of CGI was seen in "Walking With Dinosaurs".
sentences.cn: 在纪录片《与恐龙同行》中可以看到最新的、更加生动的电脑特效技术。

sentences.en: She booked the flight using a false name.
sentences.cn: 她用化名预订了航班。

sentences.en: The flagstones beneath their feet were worn smooth by centuries of use.
sentences.cn: 他们脚下的石板路经过数百年的踩踏，磨得光溜溜的。

sentences.en: The hospital has pioneered the use of birthing pools.
sentences.cn: 这家医院率先使用了分娩池。

sentences.en: The infantry would use hit and run tactics to slow attacking forces.
sentences.cn: 步兵团可能会使用打了就跑的战术来阻滞进攻部队。

sentences.en: the money was soon used up.
sentences.cn: 钱很快就用光了。

sentences.en: The patient is sedated with intravenous use of sedative drugs.
sentences.cn: 静脉注射了镇静剂后病人安然入睡。

sentences.en: To use a well-worn cliche, it is packed with information.
sentences.cn: 说得老套一点，其内容翔实。

sentences.en: Use different colours of felt pen on your sketch to avoid confusion.
sentences.cn: 用不同颜色的毡头笔画草图，以免搞混。

sentences.en: Use recorded delivery for large cheques or money orders.
sentences.cn: 对于大额的支票和汇款单要使用挂号邮寄。

sentences.en: Use your imagination when planning meals.
sentences.cn: 安排三餐时要动点脑筋。

sentences.en: Use your mouse to drag the pictures to their new size.
sentences.cn: 用鼠标拖动图片，将其调整为新的尺寸。

sentences.en: used up all our money.
sentences.cn: 用光了我们所有的钱

sentences.en: We were forbidden, under pain of imprisonment, to use our native language.
sentences.cn: 我们被禁止使用母语，违者将被关进监狱。

words.tran_cn: 可用的；便于使用的（等于usable）
习惯的；二手的，使用过的
有用的，有益的；有帮助的

phrases.tran_cn: 应要求；供…使用的；为…供应
土地利用，土地用途；土地使用，土壤使用
实际用途；实际应用；实用
引用某人名字；打出某人旗号

trans.tran_cn: （使）用，用法，用途，功能，使用权，使用价值
trans.tran_en: the action or fact of using something
if you use a particular tool, method, service, ability etc, you do something with that tool, by means of that method etc, for a particular purpose
to take an amount of something from a supply of food, gas, money etc
